title: ARAM - The least random thing to ever exist
body:
Hey Riot, 

I'd love for ARAM to pick randomly between ALL the champions I own, not just the same 4-5 champions every single time. Better still make a single lane mode where people can pick their champions. Exclude satan and make it 10000x more fun

replies.body:
> I'd love for ARAM to pick randomly between ALL the champions I own, not just the same 4-5 champions every single time.

I'm assuming you don't know how randomness works...

If I had 20 champions I would understand it if I got the same 4-5 everytime. 

What I don't understand is, out of 67 options, I have received the same 4-5 CONSTANTLY over years of playing ARAM. There's nothing random about that, it's predetermined

You want to know something about randomness? It's random. That's it's very nature. Because it's random it's unpredictable. You want to know something interesting? You could jump on Google right now, search for a random number generator, pick any of the ones that come up, input a range of 1-1000 with 1000 outcomes and it would be entirely possible for all 1000 outcomes to be, for arguments sake, 57. That, however, doesn't make it any less random.

Not to mention, your match history tells a completely different story. I did a tally of every champion you've used (there were 34 total) in every ARAM game over the past 2 months, you know what I found? It may be possible that it's not 100% accurate, though that would mean there's a problem with the website I used (OP.GG) or the Riot games API. I just now checked several other websites and they all tell the same story, so if there is problem it's not with any of the websites.
So none of them show me playing rammus? It seems like all these websites are fatally flawed, they don't show the stats of the games I have actually played :)

lmfao at your dumb comments. how are they "fatally flawed" by not showing a game. I doubt you even realise what the word fatally means in the context you've used it. the website might have made a mistake, but as he/she said, they've checked several sites and all have told a similar story.

he/she just destroyed you and this thread yet you continue to fixate on this one small issue because it's all you've got. just accept you're wrong a move on.

Sorry but statistics need to be accurate to make a point. Do you follow?

Also played Brand and Teemo in the last 2 months. Galio and Janna would be the only accurate ones on that list
some things take time to update. do you follow?
I played Brand and Teemo over a week or two ago, it has Graves, played him a few games after Rammus.

In some ways I agree with the thought, but more because it would allow players to randomly be able to try out heroes that they otherwise would have no access to playing and heroes that don't often show up in the free rotation. However then it devalues the champions and so would rightly annoy those who brought champions just so they could play them in ARAM.

Perhaps something could be done with the reroll mechanics to allow the reroll to choose from the whole pool of champions in order to mix things up a bit.

Of course, that would also turn ARAM into a "try before you buy" format in some ways.
You're Gettin Smashed in the comments... HeartVine's already proven that you get a lot more than only 4-5 champs in Aram and you're still complaining because it didn't show more champs.
